name: Moving In (Berry Berry Niceu)
description:
Moving In is about relaxing in a cozy environment. You decorate the house you are moving in. There is no goal, no timer, no challenges it is all about having a relaxing experience.  Create the house you desire.

You will be able to pick up, rotate and throw all the props. Most of the house utilty is interactable.  Lock objects in place to prevent them to move. 

W,A,S,D - Movement

Space - Jump

LMB - Pickup&Interact

RMB - Rotate

Mouse Scroll - Set object distance

Shift - Alternative Rotate

E - Interact

F - Throw

R - Lock position

Control - Crouch

Escape - Settings

Currently only the basics of the game is complete. Pick-up and interaction system. I will be improving and adding more content to the game with your feedback&help.

In this pre-alpha build you have a little cozy house and various furniture. 

Features

  • Move&Rotate&Throw Objects
  • Lock objects in place
  • Physics driven drawers&doors&parts
  • Life-like props
  • Save&Load System

Upcoming Features

  • More furniture&props in various styles
  • More Houses&Apartments
  • Basic repairing tasks you can do around the house
  • Customizable props&walls&tiles
  • Interactable Props
  • More Interactable house utility(lights etc.)
  • Improved UI
  • Take in-game screenshots

Planned to be Added in the Future

  • Multiplayer/Co-Op (Steam)
  • VR Version
  • Various Challenge Modes (Main premise of the game is having no challenges but I thought it would be fun to have some challenge modes to play from time to time)

Obviously without the players there is no point in making a game :p I value your opinion so I would appreciate if you leave a comment telling me about what you think about the game! 

Follow the development and be a part of it!


If you like what I do and want to support me please consider donating&following my socials! I am doing game development to earn a living. I gladly appriecate any kind of support!
